file_content.text: This is my fault. I shouldn't have let things go so far between us.
I know you're probably mad about not getting promoted, but look at this as a challenge to improve yourself. You like challenges.
I know you don't want to hear this, but Master Satele is right. You need to get serious about being a Jedi.
You earned this. We'll celebrate in private later.
Congratulations, Master. Blast... I have to start calling you that again, don't I? I was just getting used to "hey you with the lightsaber."
Congratulations, Master. Keep this up, and they'll put you on the Council.
Poor little Teeseven had no business running to the rescue. That's a Jedi's job.
You take your Jedi Code pretty seriously. Would it have killed you to feel a little attachment here?
I'm gonna guess they cover you in medals for this. Not that a Jedi cares about that sort of thing....
It was close, but we all made it.
This was fun. Now go punch the Emperor back to deep space.
Thanks for coming for me. I promise you won't need to come back.
Teeseven said you were about to be killed.
That's a little melodramatic--but accurate. Thanks for dropping by.
How many times have you saved my neck? I stopped counting when the number got embarrassing.
This is exactly why the Council says we shouldn't form attachments.
I distracted you from your mission. I hope that doesn't cost you.
Glad to see you didn't buy Lord Grouchy's "we're all expendable" speech.
Sorry I dragged you away from your mission. I hope this little detour doesn't hurt you.
The Emperor is my problem, Kira. Keeping out of trouble is yours.
Let me worry about that.
I couldn't face the Emperor knowing I'd abandoned you here.
Your death would be worse.
In case I haven't mentioned it lately... you're the best friend I've ever had.
I wasn't sure you cared. Amazing what a little brush with death can do.
How about a kiss for luck before I go?
[Flirt] Make it up to me.
I wanted to do that on the ship, but everyone was staring. You'd better get moving.
Kira, I'd walk across Tatooine barefoot for you.
[Flirt] I had to come.
When we get home, I'm filing a formal complaint with the Council about their stupid "no attachments" policy....
You should've thought of that before you got yourself in this mess.
It's too late for "sorry."
Point made. Lesson learned.
Since the direct approach got me nowhere, I'll focus on leading the Imperials away from you.
I'll be alright. Go finish this. May the Force be with you.
What if we pretend we're going to a costume party dressed as Jedi? Think they'd buy it?
Won't take the Empire long to realize we're here. Better move fast.
The six of us against a whole planet. I almost feel sorry for them.
